original_text: The Lord says, ‘They will bring back all your relatives who still live in other countries. They will bring them to my holy hill in Jerusalem, as a gift to me, the Lord. They will come on horses, in chariots, in carts, on mules and on camels. They will bring them in the way that the Israelites bring grain offerings to me in my temple. They bring their offerings in holy dishes.’ The Lord says, ‘They will bring back all your relatives who still live in other countries. They will bring them to my holy hill in Jerusalem, as a gift to me, the Lord. They will come on horses, in chariots, in carts, on mules and on camels. They will bring them in the way that the Israelites bring grain offerings to me in my temple. They bring their offerings in holy dishes.’ The Lord says, ‘They will bring back all your relatives who still live in other countries. They will bring them to my holy hill in Jerusalem, as a gift to me, the Lord. They will come on horses, in chariots, in carts, on mules and on camels. They will bring them in the way that the Israelites bring grain offerings to me in my temple. They bring their offerings in holy dishes.’
korean_text: 나 여호와가 말하노라 이스라엘 자손이 예물을 깨끗한 그릇에 담아 여호와의 집에 드림 같이 그들이 너희 모든 형제를 뭇 나라에서 나의 성산 예루살렘으로 말과 수레와 교자와 노새와 낙타에 태워다가 여호와께 예물로 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: They will bring back all your relatives
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너의 모든 친척들을 데려올 것이다

sentences.original_text: who still live in other countries
They will bring them to my holy hill in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들을 나의 예루살렘의 거룩한 산으로 데려올 것이다

sentences.original_text: as a gift to me, the Lord
They will bring them in the way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 그 방식으로 가져올 것이다

sentences.original_text: that the Israelites bring grain offerings to me
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 나에게 곡식 제물을 가져오는 방식

sentences.original_text: They bring their offerings in holy dishes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 거룩한 그릇에 담아 제물을 가져온다
